# Sample Markdown Document

This is a sample markdown file for testing the llmx indexer.

## Introduction

This document demonstrates various markdown features that the indexer should handle correctly.

### Features

- **Bold text** and *italic text*
- `inline code` examples
- [Links](https://example.com)

## Code Examples

### Rust Example

```rust
fn main() {
    println!("Hello, world!");
}
```

### JavaScript Example

```javascript
function greet(name) {
    return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}
```

## Tables

| Feature | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| Headers | Yes |
| Lists | Yes |
| Code | Yes |
| Tables | Yes |

## Blockquotes

> This is a blockquote.
> It can span multiple lines.

## Task Lists

- [x] Completed task
- [ ] Pending task
- [ ] Another pending task

## Conclusion

This concludes the sample markdown document.

*Last updated: 2024*
